name: Temple of Gravitasjonsmagi
description:
In this game you try to enter an old temple with the use of your magical ability, you can make objects float in two different directions. But beware you won't be able to hold it for long, this temble does not like it when someone messes with gravity.

CONTROLS:

WASD-buttons: movement

SPACE: jump

LEFT CLICK: place first marker

RIGHT CLICK: place second marker

E: select the platform you're looking at
